member.summary: Checks whether the current square is being attacked by the specified color.

member.returns: Whether or not the current square is being attacked.

member.name: M:ChessLib.Square.IsAttackedBy(ChessLib.ChessColor,System.Func{ChessLib.Square,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Checks whether the current square is being attacked by the specified color.
member.param: The color of the attacking pieces.
A predicate to filter which squares are checked.
member.returns: Whether or not the current square is being attacked.
member.remarks: The predicate is fired, after it's made sure that there is a piece on the square => Square.Piece != null.

member.summary: Selects a row of squares, spreading out from the current square.

The number to add to the file on each iteration.
member.returns: The row of squares.
